metadata.dcterms:title: Radiogenic isotope compositions of inclusions in diamond
metadata.dcterms:creator: Smit, Karen V.
metadata.dcterms:description: A literature compilation of Re-Os isotopic compositions of sulphide inclusions, and Sm-Nd isotopic compositions of garnet and clinopyroxene inclusions.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
diamond ages
Re-Os isotopes
Sm-Nd isotopes
radiogenic isotopes
inclusions
sulphides
silicates
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: Smit et al. (2022) Geochronology of Diamonds. Reviews in Mineralogy and Geochemistry (in press), doi
